original_title: Harini Amarasuriya sworn-in as Prime Minister
original_body_lines: National People’s Power (NPP) MP Dr. Harini Amarasuriya has been sworn-in as the new Prime Minister of Sri Lanka, a short while ago.
She was sworn-in before President Anura Kumara Dissanayake at the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo.
Accordingly, she is the third female Prime Minister in the history of Sri Lanka.
